subject: Re: Gateway NX-860X
body:
On Mon, Apr 30, 2007 at 08:30:32PM -0400, John S. Robertson wrote:
> 
> The wireless card (IPW3945) was a pain to get running.  Once I broke the
> code as it were, networking was fine.

care to file a bugrep?

> Anyone with this machine is welcome to drop me a line if he/she has any
> problems with the Debian install/configuration.

perhaps write up some notes on that and put a link up onto 
www.tuxmobile.com/mylaptops.html?

--
paolo
